name: destroyscreen
description: It screams 'destroy me' (or perhaps that's just a hidden violent streak you have) but you'd better be quick about it before anyone sees you.

fail.message:
Bad you! Sometimes you just have to resist your violent urges.
Just to make things worse you manage to cut yourself on the splintered screen.

reward.message:
You forgot to destroy the screen in the Atrium.
To be honest, it's probably better that you left it alone anyway.
